title: Need to Borrow Sensors for Fire Alarm System Project (MPCA)
content:
Iâ€™m working on my **MPCA project** and need to **borrow/rent some sensors** for my **fire alarm system project**. Specifically, I need:

* **Flame sensor**
* **Smoke sensor**
* **Temperature sensor**
* **Breadboard**

If anyone has these and is willing to lend/rent them, please let me know! Iâ€™m at **EC Campus** , so I can pick them up on campus. Any help would be greatly appreciated!

Thanks in advance! ðŸ˜Š

comments.body: Check with JOEL or CIE, they have sensors and breadboards and they can give to you for few days or so
afaik JOEL only gives to ECE students right?
afaik JOEL only gives to ECE students right?

If they have parts available and if they don't have any upcoming events, they may give parts to you; You just have to convince them; We took some components from JOEL and some from CIE for our project
